scheme_name: Technical Education Scholarship Scheme For Diploma Level
description: The Technical Education Scholarship Scheme for Diploma Level in Himachal Pradesh provides financial assistance to students pursuing diploma-level technical courses in recognized institutions. The scheme aims to promote technical education among students in Himachal Pradesh by covering educational expenses.
key_features: Covers tuition fees and related expenses
Implemented by the Department of Technical Education, Himachal Pradesh

benefits.scholarship_amount: Varies based on course and institution

education_criteria: Students enrolled in diploma-level technical courses
Courses must be approved by AICTE or equivalent
additional_criteria: Must be a resident of Himachal Pradesh
Annual family income criteria may apply (as per state guidelines)
Must have secured admission through merit or entrance test
institution_criteria: AICTE-approved polytechnics or technical institutions in India

eligible_courses_delhi: Diploma courses in engineering, architecture, pharmacy, etc.
Other technical diploma courses approved by AICTE

steps: Visit the Himachal Pradesh Technical Education portal or contact the department
Fill out the scholarship application form
Verification and approval by the department

special_notes: Scholarship amount varies based on course and institution
